}}'''Drow Flail''' ('''Drow Flail +3''' in-game) is an enchanted flail +3, which can be gained in the [[Underdark]] from drow warriors. It has +3 bonus to THAC0, inflicts 1d6 +4 points of damage, weighs 15 lbs and a speed factor of 4. Like all items made from adamantine, this will turn to [[Adamantine Dust]] when exposed to sunlight.

==Description==
{{Description|The flail is a sturdy wooden handle attached to an iron rod, a wooden rod with spikes, or a spiked iron ball. Between the handle and its implement is either a hinge or chain link. The weapon was originally used as a tool for threshing grain.

This item, like most drow equipment, is created using adamantine, an alloy of adamantite that quickly turns to dust if removed from the Underdark.}}
